mapper.select: select p_id, p_name, p_info, p_refund_policy, p_location from play where p_id = #{p_id}
select * from playshow where p_id = #{p_id} order by s_time
SELECT count(*) AS cnt, round(avg(review.r_play_score),1) AS avgscore FROM play, playshow, review, member WHERE review.s_id = playshow.s_id AND playshow.p_id = '1' AND review.m_code = member.m_code;

SELECT member.m_id AS m_id, review.r_content AS r_content, review.r_register_time AS r_register_time ,review.r_play_score AS r_play_score FROM play, playshow, review, member WHERE review.s_id = playshow.s_id AND playshow.p_id = '1' AND review.m_code = member.m_code order by review.r_register_time desc LIMIT 20;
